node.title: They've got all the gear and no idea, but for 'two cartons of beer' novice boaties can have a safer summer
node.alt: A group of people on a boat in open waters.
node.description: Australians who've splashed their cash on boats during the pandemic are being urged to register with the coastguard before they race off to fish the thrivingÂ reefs of North Queensland.
node.content:
["With so many Australians splashing their cash on boats during the COVID-19 pandemic, coast guards are becoming increasingly worried about amateur boaties\u00a0with all the gear and no idea.", "As the barramundi season in North Queensland draws to an end, boaties and anglers are ditching their riverine fishing spots and jetting out to reefs with gusto, but they're clogging up waters along the coast and causing a growing number of emergency evacuations.", "Angler Gavin Love\u00a0said the pandemic had driven an explosion in boat numbers.", "\"When COVID-19 kicked in, we couldn't travel anywhere else but Queensland,\" he said.", "Mr Love said a raft of new members had joined the Fisherman's Landing Social Club in Balgal Beach, north of Townsville, in a trend that had spread across the region.", "In Townsville, where one in four locals have a marine licence and one in 11 people have a registered vessel, there has been consistent growth since June 2019.", "", "
The Fisherman's Landing social club is just one group that's growing in size.(Fisherman's Landing Social Club)
", "
'Two cartons of beer'
", "More than 1,000 more boats have been registered during the pandemic, from humble tinnies to cabin cruisers to bow riders and centre consoles, according to Maritime Safety Queensland.", "But Coast Guard Deputy Commander David Finely said many newcomers had failed to register with the coast guard.", "\"Of the 14-15,000 registered pleasure boats in the Townsville area, just 2,000 of them are on our books,\" he said.", "A registration with the coast guard costs about $100 a year, but it could mean the difference between life and death.", "\"It's the cost of about two cartons of beer,\" Deputy Commander Finely said.", "\"If they overstay their visit out on the water and we're looking for them, the first thing we do is go to the car park where they have launched from to see if their car is there \u2014\u00a0because when they register with us, they can give us the description of their tow vehicle and trailer.\"", "", "
Townsville Coast Guard Deputy Commander David Finely reads a weather report over the radio.(ABC North Qld: Chloe Chomicki)
", "
Are you tuning in?
", "The number of medical evacuations on the water in North Queensland is rising rapidly, and volunteer marine services are preparing for even more when border restrictions ease in mid-December.", "In the Whitsundays, Volunteer Marine Rescue completed its 100th medical evacuation in November \u2014 three times more\u00a0than during the same period last year.", "Deputy Commander Finely said it was crucial boaties switched their radios\u00a0on, especially when\u00a0there were more boats on the water.", "\"I know one man who only turns his radio on when we broadcast the weather,\" he said.", "\"What he's missing is warnings given by marine authorities, vessels in distress that might be calling looking for assistance.", "", "
A North Queensland angler sets out for a day on the water.(Supplied: Fisherman's Landing Social Club)
", "What should be common sense is the most critical advice the coastguard has for anyone using a boat this summer.", "\"Every time they go fishing, contact us and tell us where they're going, when they're coming back,\" Deputy Commander\u00a0Finely said."]
